titleStmt.title: Confusion confounded: or, A firm way of settlement settled and confirmed. Wherein is considered the reasons of the resignation of the late Parlament, and the establishment of a Lord Protector.
titleStmt.author: Hall, John, 1627-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills, and are to be sold at his house at the sign of Sir John Old-Castle in Py-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 18. 1563"; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his house at the sign of Sir John Old-Castle in Py-Corner
